alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 9:50AM EST until January 04 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Western Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Eastern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1045 AM EST. * At 949 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Bainbridge to 8 miles south of Greensboro to 20 miles east of Stonemill Creek to 11 miles east of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Tallahassee, St. Marks, Woodville, Crawfordville, St George Island, Florida State University, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Florida A And M, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Cody, Jewel Fire Tower, Wakulla Springs, St George Island St Pk, Medart, Tallahassee Mall and Bloxham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for Big Bend of Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 PM EST for Big Bend of Florida...and south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for Big Bend of Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 PM EST for Big Bend of Florida...and south central Georgia.
